summary: A test suite that validates the core behavior of 8‑bit quantization utilities, covering configuration loading, device and data‑type handling, preservation of full‑precision modules, conversion of linear layers, conditional skipping for large language models, memory consumption, original data‑type retention, JSON serialization of quantization settings, and accurate parameter counting.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the 8‑bit quantization pipeline works correctly and efficiently, enabling reduced memory usage and reliable deployment of models in production environments.
